title: Camille A. Brown’s Latest Dance Challenge? To Have Fun.
description: The busy choreographer returns to the stage, maybe for the last time, in her celebrated trilogy exploring Black life.
dc:creator: Gia Kourlas
category: For Colored Girls Who Have Considered Suicide/When the Rainbow Is Enuf (Play)
media:credit: Elliott Jerome Brown Jr. for The New York Times
media:description: Camille A. Brown, photographed at the Apollo Theater, where “ink” (2017), the final part of her trilogy, will be staged.
